alert.note: Alert for Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 28 at 9:16PM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the Mississippi River at the following locations... Mississippi River at LaGrange. Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Saverton. Mississippi River at Canton. Mississippi River at Louisiana. Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Grafton. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Louisiana. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.2 feet, Maryland Street at 4th Street and Illinois Street between Main and Highway 79 begin flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 17.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM CDT Friday was 17.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 20.4 feet early Thursday afternoon. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Mississippi River Louisiana 15.0 17.7 18.5 19.2 19.7 20.0 20.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
